titles.title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 103 West Main Street in McLain, Mississippi, as the "Major Ed W. Freeman Post Office".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary:
3/3/2009--Introduced.
Designates the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 103 West Main Street in McLain, Mississippi, as the "Major Ed W. Freeman Post Office."
